commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: We searched by land, by sea, and by air and we couldn't find a thing! Aaargh! Where ARE you, little cryptid?!

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: Man, I thought searching by air was such a good idea too. I guess we could try searching underwater again? I'll dive this time!

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: Hmm, I dunno about that. If it's down really deep in the ocean, I think it'd be pretty tough for any of us to find it.

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: And it doesn't look like any new info's been posted online.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Maybe it's not in our ocean anymore? Maybe it's gone off to a different ocean?

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: The ocean is connected everywhere, so that's totally possible. Or, it could just be that the sightings were all made up, or that they were just seeing things.

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: There's no way! I just know the cryptid is out there!

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: Whoa! S-Sorry.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: She's right! It's too early to throw in the towel just yet!

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Ai! What's with that jar?

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Heh heh heh! The ultimate weapon for our cryptid crusade: my grandma's super yummy homemade pickles!

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: We've been searching high and low and it was all for nothin'. I think that means the cryptid is somewhere we can't get to on our own!

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: So I say, let's lure it out with something it might like! It's the only choice we have left! I call this strategy, "The Pickle Plan: Catch a Cryptid with Crunchy Cuisine!"

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: So you're saying we should use those pickles as bait? Why pickles?

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Well, a kappa is a kind of water cryptid, and they love cucumbers, right? I just happened to have some pickled cucumbers at home, so I was like, oh, this'll work!

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: Why would you... I mean, I guess they ARE cryptids, and they ARE in the water, but...

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: These are like, a hundred times tastier and are jam-packed with nutrients, so I just know a cryptid would latch right onto 'em!

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: This could work! We're totally gonna find that cryptid this time! Let's do it! How do we use these, Ai?

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Well, normally I'd say you should put it on a hook and cast it like you were fishing... But I don't have a rod, so I'm just gonna throw it in with my bare hands!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Whaaat?! B-But then it'll just sink to the bottom of the ocean! You don't wanna do that, do you?!

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: They're just vegetables, and you don't use oil when you make them or anything, so it should be fine!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: That's not what I'm worried about...!

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Here we go! I sure hope these pickles don't sour your opinion of us, little cryptid!

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Hahaha! Your puns are hilarious, Ai! Don't you think so too, Hanayo... *Gasp* GAHHH!

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Whoa, you totally scared me!

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: What's wrong, Hono... EEK?!

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: Ack!

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: Whaaat?! No way?!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: It's... It's...

commands.speaker: Honoka, Hanayo, Ai, You, Kanan
commands.line: ...A SEAL!
